subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: John McDonald drove in the go-ahead run with a seventh-inning single and Josh Towers recovered from a shaky outing with seven-plus strong innings as the Blue Jays defeated the Detroit Tigers, 2-1, yesterday in Toronto.
snippet: John McDonald drove in the go-ahead run with a seventh-inning single and Josh Towers recovered from a shaky outing with seven-plus strong innings as the Blue Jays defeated the Detroit Tigers, 2-1, yesterday in Toronto.
